title: Eliminates annual service charge of 25 dollars on issuance of special number plates to veterans of the armed forces who served in World War II
summary: Eliminates annual service charge of 25 dollars on issuance of special number plates to veterans of the armed forces who served in World War II.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3891

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A. FINCH, KATZ -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.
         McLAUGHLIN -- read once and referred to the Committee  on  Transporta-
         tion

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the issuance
         of special number plates

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of section 404 of  the  vehicle  and  traffic
    2  law,  as  amended  by  section 21 of part G of chapter 59 of the laws of
    3  2009, is amended to read as follows:
    4    1. The commissioner may issue  special  number  plates  to  applicants
    5  therefor  in  the same manner as other number plates are issued pursuant
    6  to this article. Such special number plates shall be  issued  only  upon
    7  payment  of  an  annual service charge of thirty-one dollars and twenty-
    8  five cents in addition to the regular fee  prescribed  by  section  four
    9  hundred one of this article. Application for special number plates shall
   10  be  made  in accordance with regulations promulgated by the commissioner
   11  with respect to issuance of such number plates.  Provided,  however,  in
   12  lieu  of the annual fee specified herein, the commissioner may establish
   13  specific categories of plates for which an annual fee of not  less  than
   14  eighteen dollars and seventy-five cents nor more than thirty-one dollars
   15  and  twenty-five  cents  may  be  charged subject to the approval of the
   16  director of the division of  the  budget.    NOTWITHSTANDING  ANY  OTHER
   17  PROVISION  OF THIS SECTION, THE ANNUAL SERVICE CHARGE SHALL NOT APPLY TO
   18  THE ISSUANCE OF SPECIAL NUMBER PLATES TO VETERANS OF  THE  ARMED  FORCES
   19  WHO  SERVED  IN WORLD WAR II. Notwithstanding any inconsistent provision
   20  of this section, the difference collected between the special plates fee
   21  or service charge set forth in this subdivision in effect on  and  after
   22  September first, two thousand nine and the special plates fee or service
   23  charge  set forth in this subdivision in effect prior to such date shall
   24  be deposited to the credit of the dedicated  highway  and  bridge  trust
   25  fund.
   26    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03792-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the issuance of special number plates
